title: Pesu wifi
content:
Why does the wifi keeps getting disconnected from my laptop while I am in the library ? Am i the only one facing it? 
Today it was showing “maximum login limit reached” like hello? I didn’t even connect the wifi today? How long will it take/how many days does it take for me to login again?

comments.body: send an email mentioning your issue to itteam.rr@pes.edu they'll fix it for you.
it gets fixed after the weekend automatically
the only thing slower and less consistent than pesu wifi is \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

change the password, it works fine after that  
change it on phone btw, click advanced and click continue to the link .
Maybe someone tried to login using your credentials. Usually resets within a day. Don't trust the wifi in PES, it usually is wonky.
Only i have my credentials, i have not shared it with anyone
Somtimes when their creds don't work people try random logins to try to see if there's a free one thats not in use. Maybe its like that.
